data.business_description: My business idea is to start a clothing thrift brand that provides affordable, stylish, and high-quality fashion items for students and young adults. The business will focus on carefully selected thrift jeans, official wear, and trendy crop tops that are both fashionable and budget-friendly. As a university student, I understand the financial challenges students face, and my goal is to make it possible for them to dress confidently without overspending. I plan to source quality pieces, ensure proper cleaning and presentation, and sell through social media platforms and campus pop-up sales. The GHS 10,000 support will help me purchase stock in bulk, invest in branding and packaging, and promote the business effectively. In the long term, I aim to grow the brand into a recognized student fashion hub and eventually create employment opportunities for other young people.
data.problem_statement: Many students and young people in my area struggle to find affordable, trendy, and high-quality clothing such as jeans, official wear, and crop tops. Most available options are either too expensive or limited in style. This creates a clear gap in the market for affordable, fashionable clothing that meets their needs. Solving this issue now is critical because young people are constantly seeking trendy outfits without overspending, and the demand for sustainable thrift options is rapidly growing.Thank you.
data.customer_profile: My ideal customers are young adults and students, aged 16–30, who are fashion-conscious but budget-minded. They actively look for trendy, affordable clothing, including jeans, crop tops, and office wear. These customers often shop online or in local markets, follow fashion trends on social media, and value both style and sustainability. In my area, I estimate there are over 5,000 potential customers who regularly seek affordable and stylish clothing options.Thank you.
data.competitors:
Currently, this problem is partially addressed by a few local boutiques and online thrift stores. However, most of these options are either too expensive, limited in variety, or not easily accessible to students and young adults. There is still a significant gap for affordable, trendy, and high-quality clothing that meets the needs of my target customers.
Thank you.
data.capital_required: Customers will choose my business because I will offer a unique combination of affordability, quality, and trendy styles that are hard to find in existing stores. Unlike other options, my clothing selection will focus on variety thrift jeans, official wear, and crop tops catered specifically to students and young adults. I will also provide a convenient shopping experience, including both in person and online options, making it easier for customers to access fashionable clothing without overspending.Thank you.
data.acquisition_channels:
I require 10,000 GHS to start my clothing business. The funds will be used as follows:
	•	Clothing Inventory (jeans, official wear, crop tops): 6,000 GHS – to stock a variety of trendy and affordable items, with additional items added gradually as the business grows.
	•	Equipment for Online Promotion: 2,500 GHS – to purchase a mannequin, clothing rack, tripod, and lighting for high-quality videos and photos to showcase the products online.
	•	Marketing and Miscellaneous Costs: 1,500 GHS – for promoting the business on social media and small operational expenses.

This setup ensures I can reach my target customers effectively while gradually expanding the business.Thank you.
data.team_qualification:
I will use a combination of digital and physical channels to reach and retain customers:
	•	Digital: Social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook to post high-quality videos and photos of clothing, run targeted ads, and engage with customers.
	•	Physical: Pop-up sales at school campuses or local markets to allow customers to see and try products in person.
	•	Partnerships: Collaborate with student influencers or small local brands to promote my clothing and increase visibility.

This multi-channel approach will help attract new customers and keep them engaged with my brand.
data.unique_team: As a Level 200 student with a strong understanding of my peers’ fashion needs, I am well-positioned to identify trends and select clothing that appeals to young adults. I have been following the local fashion and thrift market closely, which gives me insight into what works and what is missing. My skills in social media promotion, content creation, and customer engagement will allow me to effectively market the business and build a loyal customer base.I am looking forward to being selected please.Thank you very much.

data.business_description:
Catfish farming is indeed a lucrative business that offers a range of benefits. It is relatively 
straightforward to start and can be initiated with a reasonable capital investment. The potential for 
growth and diversification makes it an attractive venture. 
Beninash farms will specialize in the production of catfish 
with three fish ponds with an initial number of 250 fingerlings and a startup amount of GH₵10,000.00 
One of the envisioned growth prospects for catfish farming is to incorporate drying, the whole catfish 
and packaging processes to prepare the product for export. This expansion into value-added 
activities will enable the business to tap into international markets and enhance profitability. 
The key aim of this catfish farming venture is to achieve both short-term and long-term goals. In the 
short term, the focus should be on establishing a well-functioning and profitable catfish farm. This 
involves ensuring proper feeding, harvesting, waste recycling, management of water quality, 
disease prevention, and efficient breeding techniques to ensure high-quality catfish production. 
Beninash farms desire to include training the youth in the community who are interested in catfish 
farming.
In conclusion, catfish farming is a promising and rewarding business that can be initiated with a 
reasonable capital investment. By diversifying into drying and packaging for export, the business 
can access international markets and increase profitability. To achieve both short-term and long-term objectives, it is crucial to employ efficient farming practices, plan for challenges, and 
prioritize sustainable growth. With dedication and strategic planning, the business has the potential 
to expand nationally and internationally, making it a thriving enterprise in the future.
data.problem_statement:
The demand for catfish in Ghana is steadily increasing, driven by factors such as population growth, 
urbanization, and changing dietary habits. Catfish is a popular choice for consumers due to its 
nutritional benefits and affordability compared to other food options. The market demand is not 
only from local consumers but also from restaurants, supermarkets, hotels, show to kill vendors, and other businesses 
that require a steady supply of fresh catfish. 
Competitive: 
The catfish farming industry in Ghana is moderately competitive, with several players vying for 
market share. The competitive landscape can be segmented into two categories: 
a.Small-scale Producers: Small-scale catfish farmers contribute significantly to the industry, catering 
to local markets and communities. They often operate smaller catfish pond and may face challenges 
in scaling up production due to limited resources and access to technology. 
b.Commercial Producers: Commercial catfish farms are larger and more technologically advanced, 
capable of producing higher quantities of catfish for broader markets. They may have the advantage 
of economies of scale, access to modern farming techniques, and better distribution networks.
data.customer_profile: The ideal customers for our catfish farming business are low- to middle-income households, food vendors, show to kill vendors and fish traders located within nearby urban and peri-urban communities. These customers value freshness, competitive pricing, and consistent supply. They typically purchase catfish weekly in small to bulk quantities and prefer live or freshly harvested fish. The estimated market size in a medium-sized town exceeds several hundred tons per year, indicating strong unmet demand and room for new producers.
data.competitors:
My husband who is a co founder of Beninash Farms 
Mr Benjamin Bentum Anator the Manager
data.capital_required:
Our catfish farm is committed to providing healthy catfish of high nutritional value, standard weight, 
and reasonable prices. We place paramount importance on delivering exceptional customer 
service, aiming to become the leader in quality customer care. With a focus on sustainability and 
responsible practices, our farm will produce high quality catfish to meet the demand of restaurants, 
supermarkets, and individual consumers, show to kill vendors. 
Product Offerings: 
Our core product offering will be high quality catfish known for their excellent nutritional content 
and consistent weight. We are dedicated to ensuring that our catfish is healthy and of the highest 
quality, meeting the dietary needs and taste preferences of our valued customers.
data.acquisition_channels:
ITEM 
QUANTITY 
UNIT 
COST(CEDIS) /
AMOUNT(CEDIS) 
Installation of ponds ( to complete uncompleted ponds )= 2000.00
Fingerlings: 250

7 .00 per fingerling=1750.00

100.00 per a bag 
= 2000.00

TOTAL=10.000.00
data.team_qualification:
Digital Marketing: Utilize social media platforms such as Facebook, Whatsapp, TikTok, Instagram many others, a user-friendly website, and online advertising 
to reach and engage with the target audience. 
Local Promotion: Participate in community events, sponsor local activities, and collaborate with 
businesses to increase brand visibility in the region. 
Referral Programs: Implement referral incentives to encourage existing customers to refer new 
clients, expanding the customer base through word-of-mouth.
data.unique_team:
Beninash Farms  is an ambitious start-up enterprise located in Ashaiman, our core focus is on 
wholesaling and distribution of high-quality catfish products to the Ashaiman and Tema Region 
market and beyond. With a vision of introducing large quantities of well-packaged catfish, we aim 
to become a prominent player in the catfish food industry, catering to the growing demand for fresh 
and premium catfish products. 
As a young and dynamic company, we are committed to providing our customers with the finest 
catfish that meet the highest standards of taste, freshness, and packaging. Our team of experienced 
professionals will ensure that our catfish products are sourced from reputable catfish farms, and every 
step of our distribution process will be meticulously managed to maintain product quality and 
integrity. 
The team is rooted in the community where the farm operates, giving us access to land, labor, and local suppliers at lower cost. This local presence also builds trust with buyers and reduces logistics challenges.
Together, our technical expertise, market access, and operational discipline uniquely position us to successfully execute and scale a profitable catfish farming business.

data.business_description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum

data.business_description: Fast Connect is a campus-based Wi-Fi service designed to provide students with fast, affordable, and stable internet access. The business addresses common challenges students face, such as poor network coverage, unstable connections during online classes, and the high cost of mobile data in Ghana. Fast Connect will set up a strategic Wi-Fi hotspot at Hostels and near study areas, allowing users to connect easily using security passwords or vouchers. The service will offer flexible data bundles-daily, weekly, and monthly to suit different budgets and usage needs. By purchasing internet in bulk from an ISP and managing shared infrastructure, Fast Connects keeps prices student-friendly while maintaining speeds. The business aims to improve access to online learning, research, and communication on campus, support students’ digital needs and operate as a sustainable, small-scale venture with room to grow to other campuses.
data.problem_statement: Slow, unreliable, and expensive internet. Poor connectivity affects online classes, research, communication, and productivity. Since we are now in the digital world where students rely on  the internet in almost all their academic-related activities, we have no time to waste but to provide a solution.
data.customer_profile:
Demographics
That ideal customer tertiary  students on campus typically age 18 to 30 years including Diploma, undergraduate and postgraduate students do you live in campus Hostels or nearby private hostels and own smartphones and or laptops. Most have limited budgets and depend on mobile data for Internet access
Behavior
They use the Internet daily for online classes, research, assignment, social media streaming and communication. They often experience slow or unstable mobile network and price sensitive, looking for affordable but reliable Internet option. They  prefer convenience nearby Wi-Fi hotspots and flexible daily, weekly, or monthly bundles
Estimated market size
On a medium-size compass of 5000 to 10,000 students, about 30 to 50% (1500 to 5000) students are potential regular users, especially those in hostels and heavy Internet users.
data.capital_required: The service arms to offer Fast Internet speed affordable pricing for students and stable connections for online class and research uses enjoy easy access through secure Wi-Fi hotspots located at hostels  and near study areas making it convenient to connect any time . Fast connects also provides flexible data bundle daily weekly and monthly to see you to defend budgets and usage needs in addition based customer support and referral bundles improved user experience. These simple features makes fast connects reliable convenient and student friendly compared to expensive and unstable  mobile data options
data.acquisition_channels:
Startup capital 
Starlink kit :GHS 6,200
Monthly Starlink service: GHS 770
Access points/ extenders : GHS 6,700
Electricity 1 month :GHS 500
Power backup GHS 1,700
Installation (workmanship) : GHS 1500
Founders cash GHS8,000
Total cost cost :GHS 17,370
data.unique_team:
Our founding team is uniquely qualified to execute this business model because we understand the problem firsthand and a part of the target market as students on campus we experience the daily challenges of slow on Stevoo and expensive Internet in Ghana please give us a real insight into what students actually need fast speed affordable pricing and reliable connection at convenience locations
In addition to the team combines Basic technical skills in network set up strong knowledge of computers locations and study behavior enhance on commitment to customer support been on Compass allows us to respond quickly to issues Ghada feedback and improve the service continually. we are also cost-conscious and flexible which help us operate a lean startup  and adapt to changes in demand.
This close Connection to the problem that uses and it environment makes our team well positioned to successfully execute and grow Fast Connects.
